xml.title: Mobile Numbers By Date
xml.description:
This report provides numbers review metrics for the entered date range. The metrics are:
o DAU o Installs o Retention o MAU and Engagement
xml.query: -- Installs select stat_date as Date, sum(value) as Installs from star.s_game_day where game_id=$gameid and client_id=$clientid and stat_date between '$startdate' and '$enddate' and metric='NewUsers' group by 1 order by 1 ;

-- DAU select stat_date as Date, sum(value) as DAU from star.s_game_day where game_id=$gameid and client_id=$clientid and stat_date between '$startdate' and '$enddate' and metric='ActiveUsersByDay' group by 1 order by 1 ;
xml.parm: select distinct game_id, game_name from lookups.l_flurry_game order by 2
